name: Batgirl The Game
description:
-Take to the streets of Gotham as Barbara Gordon AKA Batgirl

-Fight against Killer Moth and his goons in this Action Packed fan game. 

-Use your Fighting Skills, Batarangs and Grappling hook to beat the bad guys!

-Controls-

Move and Crouch - Arrow Keys

Jump - X

Attack - C

Switch Between Melee and Batarangs - Z

Grappling Hook - Up and X

Drop from Platform - Down and X

Wall Jump - X while pressing against wall

Reset - R

This was an idea I had after the abrupt cancellation of the Batgirl movie starring Leslie Grace. Nothing much, just something to pay tribute to a movie I would have liked to see. I did the sprite work while my buddy Krizby programmed the game. We hope you enjoy it!

-Credits-

Enemy sprite bases ripped by Solink and Deathbringer 

Boss music from Batman NES Composed by Naoki Kodaka 

Level music from Batman the animated series Game Boy Composed by Yoshiyuki Hagiwara

Original sprites and pixel art by Robin (Bobbytriesatlife)

Programmed by Krizby
